TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Visualizer extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: The Visualizer class enables application to retrieve part of the currently playing audio for visualization purpose.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 audioSession) cil managed

Docs.param: system wide unique audio session identifier. If audioSession is not 0, the visualizer will be attached to the MediaPlayer or AudioTrack in the same audio session. Otherwise, the Visualizer will apply to the output mix.
Docs.summary: Class constructor.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32[] GetCaptureSizeRange() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the capture size range.
Docs.returns: the mininum capture size is returned in first array element and the maximum in second array element.

Docs.param: a non-null Visualizer.MeasurementPeakRms instance to store the measurement values.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the latest peak and RMS measurement.
Docs.returns: #SUCCESS in case of success, #ERROR_BAD_VALUE, #ERROR_NO_MEMORY, #ERROR_INVALID_OPERATION or #ERROR_DEAD_OBJECT in case of failure.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Android.Media.Audiofx.VisualizerStatus SetDataCaptureListener (Android.Media.Audiofx.Visualizer.IOnDataCaptureListener? listener, int rate, bool waveform, bool fft);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype Android.Media.Audiofx.VisualizerStatus SetDataCaptureListener(class Android.Media.Audiofx.Visualizer/IOnDataCaptureListener listener, int32 rate, bool waveform, bool fft) cil managed

abstract member SetDataCaptureListener : Android.Media.Audiofx.Visualizer.IOnDataCaptureListener * int * bool * bool -> Android.Media.Audiofx.VisualizerStatus override this.SetDataCaptureListener : Android.Media.Audiofx.Visualizer.IOnDataCaptureListener * int * bool * bool -> Android.Media.Audiofx.VisualizerStatus

Docs.param: rate in milliHertz at which the capture should be updated
true if a waveform capture is requested: the onWaveFormDataCapture() method will be called on the OnDataCaptureListener interface.
true if a frequency capture is requested: the onFftDataCapture() method will be called on the OnDataCaptureListener interface.
Docs.summary: Registers an OnDataCaptureListener interface and specifies the rate at which the capture should be updated as well as the type of capture requested.
Docs.returns: #SUCCESS in case of success, #ERROR_NO_INIT or #ERROR_BAD_VALUE in case of failure.

format.a: Java documentation for android.media.audiofx.Visualizer.setDataCaptureListener(android.media.audiofx.OnDataCaptureListener, int, boolean, boolean).
